description:
Marry is the number 4 member of the Blindfold group. She is the first non-founding member of the group.
Her ability is "Stone". She has the ability to paralyze people for a short time upon eye contact.
Marry is 1/4 Medusa who has a look of a 14 year old girl, but her real age is 140. (She ages about a year every 10 years. Her mother used to age about every 100 years and her grandmother about every 1000). Her long hair wiggles with her emotions due to her Medusa blood. Unlike other group members, her eyes are naturally red.
She gained her ability after she and her mom entered the Void Space (Heat Haze) after being harassed and beaten to death by strangers. There, her mother acquired stone eyes and passed it to her daughter to give her a second chance. Marry managed to escape while leaving her mom behind.
She joined the Blindfold gang after meeting Seto while he was attempting to commit suicide.
Her songs are: "Kusou Forest" (DayDream forest) which tells the story of her past, and "Marry no kaku Sekai" (Marry`s fictional World) which describes the realm she creates.
name: Kozakura Marry
